data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Xinyang words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xinyang, Henan, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 143,082 believers in Xinyang, Henan, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Xinyang to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Xinyang, Henan, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Xinyang who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Xinyang, Henan, China.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xinyang, Henan, China has a population of 1,886,100.

We estimate Xinyang has 143,082 people who might know Jesus, 30,470 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,712,549 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Xinyang a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Xinyang
location.cities_list: Xinyang, Dingcheng, Minggang, Xinji, Huaibin Chengguanzhen
